div.p: This work was supported by São Paulo Research Foundation—FAPESP (2015/14278-6). The authors thank the botanist Inara Regiane Moreira Coneglian for plant identification; our collaborators Mário Machado Martins, Eduardo Bagagli, Vera Lúcia Mores Rall and Luiz Claudio Di Stasi for analysis tools, materials and helpful suggestions; Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel—CAPES for the scholarship granted to Fabiana Barcelos Furtado.
